subject: Public Meeting: Schedule and Agenda (Oct 8, 2025)
body:
Hello,

You are invited to a public meeting. Details:
- Date: Wednesday, October 8, 2025
- Time: 3:00–4:30 PM Eastern Time (UTC-4)
- Format: Virtual (join link below)
- Registration: Optional but appreciated (registration link below)

Agenda (non-confidential):
1) Welcome and meeting overview (5 min)
2) Program updates and recent milestones (20 min)
3) High-level budget and timeline review (15 min)
4) Upcoming activities and opportunities for input (20 min)
5) Q&A and public comment (25 min)
6) Next steps and adjourn (5 min)

Materials:
- Agenda attached and linked below
- Slide deck will be posted after the meeting
- Recording and notes will be shared on the event page within 3 business days

Accessibility:
- Live captions will be available
- To request accommodations or translation/interpretation, please email accessibility@example.org at least 48 hours in advance

Participation guidelines:
- Please keep comments respectful and on-topic
- The meeting will be recorded and may be posted publicly
- Code of Conduct: see link below

Questions: publicengagement@example.org

We look forward to your participation.
